title: Investigate an Inventory Discrepancy
description: A significant discrepancy is found for a high-value item during a stock take. A manager must investigate the cause.

tasks.description: Identify the item with the discrepancy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the item and the size of the discrepancy.

tasks.description: Review all transaction history for the item (shipments, receipts, adjustments) for the last 90 days.
Review warehouse security footage for the item's location around the time of the last known accurate count.
Conclude the cause is likely a mis-shipment and create a report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a report on the investigation, concluding the items were likely shipped in error on another order.
